Akinyemi bụ onye edemede Naijiria na-enweta ọtụtụ ihe nrite na onye na-ede uri nke a maara nke ọma maka nchịkọta uri ya nke a kpọrọ Dead Lions Don't Roar
A mụrụ Akinyemi Tolulope Adeola Akinyemi na Ado-Ekiti
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ dika onye na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba nke nwere nzere na Mahadum Ekiti State na nzere masta na Accounting na Financial Management na Mahadim Hertfordshire, Hatfield, United Kingdom.
Akinyemi si Naijiria kwaga UK na 2010 ma bipụta akwụkwọ iri na anọ kemgbe ahụ. Akinyemi wepụtara akwụkwọ uri mbụ y nke a kpọrọ, Dead Lions Don't Roar, n'afọ 2017.

Akinyemi wepụtara Dead Dogs Don't Bark, akwụkwọ uri ya nke abụọ na akwụkwọ nke atọ na 2018. Dead Cats Don't Meow sochiri ya, nke a tọhapụrụ n'ọnwa Eprel 2019 ma gosipụta njem akwụkwọ ọtụtụ mba nke UK na Naịjirịa.
A tọhapụrụ akwụkwọ Akinyemi ma na mbipụta akwụkwọ nakwa n'ịntanetị
A na-enyocha uri ya dị ka "abụ uri nke elu" site na akwụkwọ akụkọ nke English Studies in Africa.
Akinyemi bụkwa onye na-ede uri na-eme ihe nkiri ma bụrụkwa onye isi na Great Northern Slam, Crossing The Tyne Festival, Feltonbury Arts and Music Festival, The Havering Literary Festival.
Ọ bụ onye na-ede uri n'oge gara aga na mmemme Havering Libraries Black History Month n'ọnwa Ọktoba 2021 ma bụrụkwa onye isi akụkọ na Woolwich Centre Library National Poetry Day n'ọnba 2018.
Ọ kwadoro ya dị ka onye edemede nwere nkà pụrụ iche site na Arts Council England.

N'afọ 2020, o ritere ihe nrite Best Indie Book Award maka nchịkọta uri ya, A Booktiful Love Nchịkọta akụkọ mkpirikpi ya, Inferno of Silence, meriri 2021 IRDA Discovery Award maka akụkọ mkpirisi na Next Generation Indie Book Awards (2021) maka Best Cover Design (Fiction).
Kemgbe afọ 2017, Akinyemi enyewo pasentị site na ego akwụkwọ ya nwetara maka ọrụ ebere
Ọ jiri ego rụrụ otú pụkụ pound (£1000) wee kwado mkpọsa ọbụbụenyi nke Age UK Northumberland na.
